```py
 Task A          Task B
        | 
  Acquire lock
Yields to runtime
        | 
        +--------------+
                       |
             Tries to acquire lock 
```

```py
 Task A          Task B
          | 
  Acquires the lock
  Starts `http_call`
  Yields to runtime
          | 
          +--------------+
                         |
             Tries to acquire the lock
              Cannot acquire the lock
                 Yields to runtime
                         |
          +--------------+
          |
`http_call` completes      
  Releases the lock
   Yield to runtime
          |
          +--------------+
                         |
                 Acquires the lock
                       [...] 
```
